thread.title: Great stay
thread.title_full: Great stay - Review of Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: nolarhoco
title: Great stay
text: Comfortable, clean, convenient location and great value. Friendly and helpful staff. Bathroom a bit odd - not much counter space and the shower was not set apart or self contained, just separated from the rest of the room by a curtain. Resulted in water all over the floor and overuse of towels to sop up the water. Minor inconvenience though. Really liked the tile floor throughout the room - major improvement over carpet. Would definitely stay here again.
